title: LF Adelaide Based Play By Play Caster
body:
Hey there, I am looking for an adelaide based play by play caster for the Tesla League Season 2.

Experience is recommended, HMU if interested :)

No negative comments pls.

replies.body: I'm from Melbourne, but I used to cast for CS:GO a few years ago. I don't mind the travel, do you have more details?

Can you add me on league mate? IGN: Kairutox

We will talk about it further.
